text:
#coronavirus 
We must learn from 1918 pandemic up to 100 million died.
We cannot stop the 1st wave. We must prepare for an even more deadlier 2nd wave in late summer and even a 3rd winter wave.
Not scaremongering, learn from history, burying our heads won't make it go away.
